data.title: Police Log 03-02-23
data.meta_description: Assault On 02/27/23 at 0715 hrs Officers arrested Richard Luke (42) of 12 Old Park Av #1, Cranston for Domestic Simple Assault and Domestic Disorderly Conduct. Arrest was the result of subject  …
data.text:
Assault

On 02/27/23 at 0715 hrs Officers arrested Richard Luke (42) of 12 Old Park Av #1, Cranston for Domestic Simple Assault and Domestic Disorderly Conduct. Arrest was the result of subject turning himself in on a CPD arrest warrant.

Disposition of Arrestee: Transported to 3rd Dist Court

Violation of No Contact Order

On 2/24/23 at 1230 hrs., Officers arrested Eric Sweeney, 30, of 20 Randall St. # 5S Providence, RI, for Violation of No Contact Order and an outstanding arrest warrant out of Providence PD. The arrest was the result of an attempted pickup at 101 New London Ave. (Econo Lodge).

Disposition of Arrestee: Awaiting arraignment as a probation violator.

…

On 2/25/23 at 2105 hours Officers arrested John Leonard Young (32) of 36 Stirling Dr. Glocester RI, for Violation of a No Contact Order – 3rd or Subsequent Offense. Arrest is the result of a call for service at 662 Park Ave. 1st Fl.

Disposition of Arrestee: Held for Arraignment (Violator)

DUI

On 2/25/2023, at 0017hrs. Officers arrested Scott Kean (29) of 37 Royal St. Apt. 2 Providence, for DUI BAC Unknown 1st Offense, and Duty to Stop – Damage to Attended Vehicles. The accident was the result of a call for service involving a hit-and-run traffic accident at the intersection of Puritan Ave. And Cranston St.

Disposition of Arrestee: Held for morning arraignment

…

On 2/27/23 at 0212 hours Officers arrested Mariah A. Nugent (20) of 207 Ledge Rd. Seekonk, Massachusetts for DUI (BAC unknown), Breathalyzer Refusal and obstructing an officer. The arrest is the result of a call for a female passed out behind the wheel of her vehicle in the drive thru lane at the McDonald's located at 923 Cranston Street.

Disposition of Arrestee: Awaiting arraignment by a Justice of the Peace

Shoplifting

On 2/25/23 at 1807 hours Officers arrested Sumeet Singh (44) of 2058 Elmwood Ave. Warwick, for Shoplifting. Arrest is the result of a call for service at 204 Garfield Ave. (Stop and Shop)

Disposition of Arrestee: Arraigned by a Justice of the Peace

Possession of Stolen Vehicle

On 2/25/23 at 1658 hours Officers arrested David Durlach (29) of 171 Rope Ferry Rd. Waterford CT, for Possession of Stolen Vehicle – 1st Offense. Arrest is the result of a motor vehicle stop on Broad St.

Disposition of Arrestee: Arraigned by a Justice of the Peace

Disorderly Conduct

On 2/26/23 at 0001 hours Officers arrested Vincent Charles Spenard (30) of 107 Walnut St. Johnston, for disorderly conduct. The arrest is the result of a disturbance call at the Thirsty Beaver, 288 Atwood Avenue

Disposition of Arrestee: Awaiting arraignment by a Justice of the Peace
